short_summary: IITB's Branch Operations and Planning (BOP) Directorate transform and improve costing processes, implement innovative technology, and achieve service excellence.
description: Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC) requires multiple resources to transform Innovation Information and Technology Branch (IITB)’s Branch Operations and Planning (BOP) Directorate to ensure it becomes a trusted operational and strategic partner in providing IITB clients high-quality people management, financial management, and change management and communications services.
